IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO IMPROVE CARE, EXPAND OPTIONS, AND EMPOWER EVERYONE TO CHART THEIR END-OF-LIFE JOURNEY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO IMPROVE CARE, EXPAND OPTIONS, AND EMPOWER EVERYONE TO CHART THEIR END-OF-LIFE JOURNEY.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION OFFERS PROGRAMS AND MEMBERSHIPS AND WORKS AT THE FEDERAL AND STATE LEVEL TO ADVOCATE AND HELP INSURE THAT ALL HOPELESSLY ILL AMERICANS HAVE ACCESS TO THE FULL RANGE OF END-OF-LIFE OPTIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATIONS ADOPTED THE PROVISIONS OF TOPIC 740 ON JULY 1, 2009. THE ADOPTION OF TOPIC 740 DID NOT RESULT IN A MATERIAL MODIFICATION OF THE OVERALL FINANCIAL STATEMENTS OF THE ORGANIZATIONS AS OF AND FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2010. AS THE ORGANIZATIONS ARE QUALIFIED AS NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS UNDER THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE, ANY INCOME TAX POSITION WOULD BE PRIMARILY RELATED TO UNRELATED BUSINESS ACTIVITIES OUTSIDE THE CORE MISSION OF THE ORGANIZATIONS. BASED ON PRIOR EXAMINATIONS OF CONTRACTUAL ARRANGEMENTS OF THE ORGANIZATIONS AND CORRESPONDENCE RECEIVED FROM THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE, MANAGEMENT BELIEVES THERE TO BE NO POTENTIAL INCOME TAX POSITIONS THAT WOULD RESULT IN RELATED TAX LIABILITY FOR THE ORGANIZATIONS. MANAGEMENT WILL CONTINUE TO EVALUATE ANY FUTURE CONTRACTUAL ARRANGEMENTS WITH RESPECT TO POTENTIAL INCOME TAX POSITIONS UNDER THIS GUIDANCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER TRANSMITS THE ORGANIZATION'S FORM 990 TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR REVIEW BY EACH MEMBER OF THE BOARD. ANY COMMENTS ARE CIRCULATED TO THE ENTIRE BOARD AND FINAL VERSION WITH REVISIONS (IF ANY) IS PROVIDED TO ALL BOARD MEMBERS BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS SELF-MONITORED BY THE INDIVIDUAL BOARD MEMBERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS DETERMINES THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S SALARY BY LOOKING AT COMPARABLE DATA AND BY RESEARCHING OUTSIDE SOURCES. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR DETERMINES THE EXECUTIVE MANAGER'S SALARIES BY DOING MARKET RESEARCH.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, FORM 1023 AND FORM 990, ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST AND ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE.

TEMPORARY STAFF: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 2. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 2. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 0. TOTAL EXPENSES 4. PAYROLL EXPENSE: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 15,979. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 9,632. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 0. TOTAL EXPENSES 25,611.
PRIOR PERIOD ADJ-INTERCOMPANY RECLASS WITH COMPASSION & CHOICES 501(C)(3) -472,622.

THE AUDIT/FINANCE COMMITTEE IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE SELECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT AUDITOR AND THE AUDIT OF THE ORGANIZATIONS' FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THERE HAS BEEN NO CHANGE FROM THE PRIOR YEAR PROCESS OF SELECTION.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: EMPOWERS EVERYONE TO CHART THEIR END-OF-LIFE JOURNEY.
